dag_files.description: Final corrected large-scale cross-node expert parallelism DAG with proper acyclic structure

image_files.description: SVG visualization of the final corrected DAG

requirements_met: Single DAG generated consolidating all content
GPU boundaries clearly specified with exact GPU IDs
Nodes detailed to operator level (MLA, Expert Gating, Expert MLP, Residual Add)
Input/Output dimensions included for all nodes
Ellipses for communication, rectangles for computation, parallelograms for routing
Token routing shown with dashed lines
All nodes have proper connectivity (except input/output nodes)
Expert nodes have both incoming and outgoing edges
Proper DAG structure with no disconnected components
